channel.title: CVE Feed for Unknown -- Media from FTP
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Unknown -- Media from FTP

item.title: CVE-2023-4019|2024-08-02T07:17:11.565Z -- unknown -- media%20from%20ftp
item.description: The Media from FTP WordPress plugin before 11.17 does not properly limit who can use the plugin, which may allow users with author+ privileges to move files around, like wp-config.php, which may lead to RCE in some cases.
